patthana4.5:1.1.pli: Kusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.5:2.1.pli: Akusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.5:3.1.pli: Abyākataṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:4.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:6.1.pli: Kusalo sārammaṇo dhammo kusalassa sārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.5:7.1.pli: Akusalo sārammaṇo dhammo akusalassa sārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.5:8.1.pli: Abyākato sārammaṇo dhammo abyākatassa sārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.5:9.1.pli: Kusalo sārammaṇo dhammo kusalassa sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:10.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:12.1.pli: Abyākataṃ anārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:16.1.pli: Abyākato anārammaṇo dhammo abyākatassa anārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … atthipaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo (sabbattha ekaṃ. Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:17.1.pli: Kusalo citto dhammo kusalassa cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:18.1.pli: Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta …pe… upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, natthiyā satta, vigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:21.1.pli: Kusalaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.5:22.1.pli: Akusalaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.5:23.1.pli: Abyākataṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.5:24.1.pli: Kusalaṃ nocittañca abyākataṃ nocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.5:25.1.pli: Akusalaṃ nocittañca abyākataṃ nocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.5:26.1.pli: Kusalaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:27.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)

patthana4.5:28.1.pli: Kusalo nocitto dhammo kusalassa nocittassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:29.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:30.1.pli: Kusalaṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.5:31.1.pli: Akusalaṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.5:32.1.pli: Abyākataṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:33.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:35.1.pli: Kusalo cetasiko dhammo kusalassa cetasikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.5:36.1.pli: Akusalo cetasiko dhammo akusalassa cetasikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.5:37.1.pli: Abyākato cetasiko dhammo abyākatassa cetasikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.5:38.1.pli: Kusalo cetasiko dhammo kusalassa cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.5:39.1.pli: Akusalo cetasiko dhammo akusalassa cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.5:40.1.pli: Abyākato cetasiko dhammo abyākatassa cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:41.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:43.1.pli: Kusalaṃ acetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.5:44.1.pli: Akusalaṃ acetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.5:45.1.pli: Abyākataṃ acetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.5:46.1.pli: Kusalaṃ acetasikañca abyākataṃ acetasikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.5:47.1.pli: Akusalaṃ acetasikañca abyākataṃ acetasikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:48.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana4.5:49.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe pañca, novigate pañca.

patthana4.5:51.1.pli: Kusalaṃ cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ cittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivatti dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:52.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:54.1.pli: Abyākataṃ ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:55.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:57.1.pli: Kusalo ajjhattiko dhammo kusalassa ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo ajjhattiko dhammo akusalassa ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo ajjhattiko dhammo abyākatassa ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.5:58.1.pli: Akusalo ajjhattiko dhammo akusalassa ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.5:59.1.pli: Abyākato ajjhattiko dhammo abyākatassa ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:60.1.pli: Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā …pe… samanantare satta, sahajāte nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte ekaṃ, āsevane tīṇi, vipāke āhāre indriye ekaṃ …pe… vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:62.1.pli: Kusalaṃ bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:63.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)

patthana4.5:64.1.pli: Kusalo bāhiro dhammo kusalassa bāhirassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:65.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:67.1.pli: Abyākato upādā dhammo abyākatassa upādā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … atthipaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.5:68.1.pli: Āhāre ekaṃ, indriye atthiyā avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:69.1.pli: Kusalaṃ noupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.5:70.1.pli: Akusalaṃ noupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.5:78.1.pli: Abyākato noupādā dhammo abyākatassa noupādā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.5:79.1.pli: Kusalo noupādā dhammo kusalassa noupādā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.5:81.1.pli: Abyākato noupādā dhammo abyākatassa noupādā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:82.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare …pe… sahajāte satta, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye upanissaye nava …pe… vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate ekādasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:84.1.pli: Abyākataṃ upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato upādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:85.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:87.1.pli: Kusalaṃ anupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.5:91.1.pli: Akusalaṃ anupādinnañca abyākataṃ anupādinnañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:92.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:94.1.pli: Kusalo anupādinno dhammo kusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.5:95.1.pli: Akusalo anupādinno dhammo akusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.5:97.1.pli: Kusalo anupādinno dhammo kusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.5:99.1.pli: Abyākato anupādinno dhammo abyākatassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Abyākato anupādinno dhammo kusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Abyākato anupādinno dhammo akusalassa anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:100.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare cha …pe… sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi …pe… vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate ekādasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:102.1.pli: Akusalaṃ upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.5:103.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Upādānagocchakaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana4.6:9.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ, avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)

patthana4.6:10.1.pli: Kusalo nokileso dhammo kusalassa nokilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.6:12.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana4.6:13.1.pli: Kusalaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.6:14.1.pli: Akusalaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.6:15.1.pli: Abyākataṃ saṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.6:16.1.pli: Kusalaṃ saṅkilesikañca abyākataṃ saṅkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.6:17.1.pli: Akusalaṃ saṅkilesikañca abyākataṃ saṅkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.6:18.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:20.1.pli: Kusalo saṅkilesiko dhammo akusalassa saṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.6:24.1.pli: Kusalaṃ asaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo asaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.6:25.1.pli: Abyākataṃ asaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:26.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:28.1.pli: Kusalo asaṅkilesiko dhammo kusalassa asaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.6:29.1.pli: Abyākato asaṅkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa asaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.6:30.1.pli: Abyākato asaṅkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa asaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Abyākato asaṅkilesiko dhammo kusalassa asaṅkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:31.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve …pe… upanissaye cattāri …pe… kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:33.1.pli: Akusalaṃ saṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:34.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:36.1.pli: Kusalaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo asaṅkiliṭṭho ca abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana4.6:37.1.pli: Abyākataṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhañca abyākataṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.6:38.1.pli: Kusalaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana4.6:39.1.pli: Abyākataṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:40.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:42.1.pli: Kusalo asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo kusalassa asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.6:43.1.pli: Abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo abyākatassa asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.6:44.1.pli: Kusalo asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo kusalassa asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … dve.

patthana4.6:45.1.pli: Abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo abyākatassa asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:46.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:48.1.pli: Akusalaṃ kilesasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kilesasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkiliṭṭhadukasadisaṃ.)

patthana4.6:49.1.pli: Akusalaṃ kilesañceva saṅkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:52.1.pli: Kusalaṃ saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.6:53.1.pli: Akusalaṃ saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.6:54.1.pli: Abyākataṃ saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.6:55.1.pli: Kusalaṃ saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesañca abyākataṃ saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.6:56.1.pli: Akusalaṃ saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesañca abyākataṃ saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:57.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:59.1.pli: Kusalo saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo kusalassa saṅkilesikassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.6:60.1.pli: Abyākato saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo abyākatassa saṅkilesikassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:61.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana4.6:62.1.pli: Akusalaṃ kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:63.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:65.1.pli: Akusalaṃ saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saṅkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.6:68.1.pli: Akusalaṃ kilesañceva kilesasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.6:71.1.pli: Akusalaṃ kilesasampayuttañceva no ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kilesasampayutto ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:74.1.pli: Kusalaṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko ca abyākato kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana4.6:75.1.pli: Abyākataṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.6:76.1.pli: Kusalaṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikañca abyākataṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:77.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:79.1.pli: Kusalo kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo kusalassa kilesavippayuttassa saṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.6:80.1.pli: Abyākato kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa kilesavippayuttassa saṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:81.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana4.6:82.1.pli: Kusalaṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ asaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.6:83.1.pli: Abyākataṃ kilesavippayuttaṃ asaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.6:84.1.pli: Hetuyā dve …pe… āsevane vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:86.1.pli: Kusalo kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko dhammo kusalassa kilesavippayuttassa asaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana4.6:87.1.pli: Abyākato kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko dhammo abyākatassa kilesavippayuttassa asaṅkilesikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.6:88.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve …pe… upanissaye cattāri …pe… kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
